metadata.name: Light
metadata.description:
The walls are cracking, people are killed. There is no light or water. These are the consequences of the Russian occupation of Yahidne village, Chernihiv region, Ukraine.

The photo was taken in the house of Lyudmila grandmother. The occupiers killed her sons, and the house is falling apart.

Part of the sale will be donated to Ukrainian organization "Repair.Together", which helps residents of Yahidne village.
